main event: On 13 July 1953, an unidentified circular object was observed at Shaw AFB, South Carolina, for approximately 7 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as circular with an estimated diameter of 15 to 20 feet,The object appeared to travel at a high rate of speed and was at an altitude of approximately 1000 to 2000 feet,No sound was heard during the observation.,The sighting occurred at around 2100 EST,No physical evidence was found following the sighting.
witness description: a jet pilot instructor with considerable flight experience
